click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: text-align: left;

div.p: This site is designed to provide you information and resources from CSD School Counselors during our school closure and distance learning opportunity. For information specific to your grade level, please click on the appropriate school level above. Please check this site regularly as we will update regularly. As always, we are beyond thankful for our Spartan community and appreciate your partnership in promoting the academic, social/emotional and career development of our students!

p.style: text-align: left;

div.p: The CSD Counseling Department has a list of community resources for different counseling needs. Please reach out to one of our Counselors for referral services. We are here to help!

p.style: text-align: left;

div.p: If you are experiencing a non-medical mental and/or behavioral health emergency and are not able to touch base with a CSD School Counselor for referral services, please refer to one of the following community partners:

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Cardinal Innovations 24/7 Crisis Line 1-800-273-5911. Representatives & Clinicians will provide crisis & referral information for families in Mecklenburg, Cabbarus and Rowan counties. Insurance and Medicaid referrals.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Partners 24/7 Crisis Line 1-888-235-HOPE(4673). Representatives & Clinicians will provide crisis & referral information for families in Iredell, Catawba and Lincoln counties. Insurance and Medicaid referrals.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: United Way 211. Dial 2-1-1 for confidential services to help find local resources 24/7.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: As always, if you are experiencing a medical or mental health emergency, call 911.

p.style: text-align: left;

div.p: Every day is filled with new information and changes. Every day presents new challenges. More importantly, every day presents new opportunities. Please use the following link to share your stories with us! Your story may include: an inspirational quote, funny family story, new found hobby, a picture, a favorite recipe, or a moment of gratitude. We will publish your stories on this site for all to enjoy. After all, Spartan Stories always unite...even from a distance!

p.style: text-align: center;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: For some GOOD NEWS, check out Some Good News with John Krasinski!!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Please click HERE for Resources for families in need during the COVID-19 Quarantine.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Please take a moment to read Governor Roy Cooper's new orders re: K-12 schools staying closed for in-person instruction until May 15.

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: CSD admin will discuss and send communication to all of our families after we have a day to process the impact.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

p.style: text-align: center;

div.p: Need a break from all the COVID-19 coverage? Feeling stress about our "new normal"? Visit our Virtual Relaxation room for peace of mind. Experience. Relaxation.

p.style: text-align: center;
